About

Get to Know Toberak

Toberak is a highly creative and innovative person, always seeking new ways to approach problems and find effective technical solutions. His fresh and original approach is reflected in his work as the founder of GDT, as well as his collaborations with Matcherino to improve crowdfunding for esports events.


In addition to being an impressive technical leader, Toberak is a true entrepreneur. His vision and business skills have been crucial to the creation of an esports organization on Discord, as well as his success in the world of esports events. His ability to think holistically and multifacetedly allows him to navigate different roles and business areas with ease.


His ability to build strong and meaningful relationships with people is one of the keys to his success. Toberak understands that esports is a diverse and complex community, and he makes sure to listen and collaborate with a wide range of voices and perspectives to create exciting and fun events for everyone. Undoubtedly, his multifaceted approach and his ability to relate to others are valuable traits in any field, but especially in the constantly evolving world of esports.

Toberak's Projects

  • Toberak1
  • reyconejo87

Toberak is renowned for founding GDT, an organization for esports events on Discord with official support, focused on Badland Brawl. He has also partnered with Matcherino to enhance crowdfunding and has become a key figure in the development of esports events on an international scale. His ability to organize exciting and fun events has made a significant impact on the gaming community worldwide.
